title: Fairy Tales Music Pack - Volume 1
description: A pack of 27 + tracks of FairyTale-themed, enchanting audio delights!
longDescription:
Perfect for anything with a FairyTale vibe, a mixture of light, fairy feels, enchantment and journeying music. Mostly gentle with a touch of magic throughout.


*** This pack is also included in the Mighty MUSIC MEGA PACK - Volume 1 along with eleven other albums and assorted goodies at an amazing discounted price. Click HERE to check it out! ***


Please feel free to let me know about your project if it features my music so I can share and promote your game.


The FairyTales Music Pack - Volume 1 by Ethan Lewis Maltby is a magical pack of light orchestral and colourful tracks written for any project looking for some enchantment. Includes full tracks perfect for menus and in-game action plus some extras for uppers and downers for Success and Failure and some darker moments.


FAIRYTALES MUSIC PACK - Overview

- NINE main, full tracks of light, magical and enchanting vibes: LISTEN HERE

- EIGHTEEN adaptations of the main tracks for variation and looping: LISTEN HERE and HERE


MAIN THEMES [each comes with two loopable variations]

1 - A Dark Journey - [02:12]

2 - A Peaceful Journey - [01:56]

3 - Enchanted Forest - [02:09]

4 - Gentle Wonder - [02:15]

5 - A Music Box - [01:31]

6 - Sleepy Princess - [02:21]

7 -The Crystal Palace - [02:14]

8 - The Magic Fairy - [02:20]

9 - WarmzySmooth - [01:42]
technicalDetails:
Features:

- All tracks are FULLY LOOPABLE for total flexibility.

- Selection of EXTRA tracks and fx with a fairytale theme. LISTEN HERE

- 58 Minutes of Fully Mastered tracks ready for import

- Professional Quality wav files, 16bit/44.1khz

- Composed and Produced by a musician with two decades of professional experience in Film, TV, Sporting Events and Theatre


Number of Audio Wavs: 27

Number of Audio Cues: 27

Sample rate / bit rate: 16bit/44.1khz

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 58

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Additional Notes:

Please do let me know if you use my work on any of your games so I can share and promote.

For any questions, enquiries or if you are interested in collaborations or commissions, please feel free to contact me and for more information about my work, please visit my website.
